models

Class Photo

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Photo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Photo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The photo class keeps track of the caption that is associated with each photo, the date of the photo, the tags associated with each photo, the location of the photo, and the album it is associated with.
    Author:
    Evan Loriot, Joseph Klaszky
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
